name: Existential Crisis 2: The Elite Unit | EARLY ACCESS | Shoot-em-up
name_original: Existential Crisis 2: The Elite Unit | EARLY ACCESS | Shoot-em-up
description:
Story:

After Kyle Kaboom single-handedly took down the Allis, all was well for five years. On the anniversary of their defeat, something strange began to happen at the junkyard planet above which the war had ended. Strange signals were being transmitted that sounded oddly like the Allis war ships. In light of this, the government formed a team consisting of elite soldiers from all across the universe, determined to put a stop to whatever was happening there, and end the war for good.

Gameplay:

Play as Seven unique characters in this all new Shmup from Retrocade Media. Avoid bullets and shoot everything in sight in the brand new Sphaera Skyrocket Mach 2, capable of... well just shooting right now.

This game is INCOMPLETE and therefore does not necessarily reflect the finished product, various planned features are missing, every stage other than the first is missing, and mechanics, graphics, sound, and basically everything else is subject to change over time.



This video is outdated, powerups shown have been changed as well have enemy designs and some other minor detail. This will be updated soon.

Please leave constructive criticism below, this game is incomplete and therefore needs all the feedback it can get!
